Title: Star Trek File Browser (with Touch)
Description:
Simple File-Browser that should look a bit like the Star Trek TNG displays.
Thoguht it would be great to have this on a touchtable oder -display.
Runs also with mouse.

Developed in .Net 4.0 using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simple File-Browser that should look a bit like the Star Trek TNG displays.
Thoguht it would be great to have this on a touchtable oder -display.
Runs also with mouse.

Developed in .Net 4.0 using WPF.


Known Bugs
Some displaying stuff does not run smoothly.
- connecting lines from active elements
- length & position of the connecting line for elements on the right side
- selection sometimes does not disable the last selection

Possible Improvements
- animations
- a real doc-viewer
- movie viewer
- edit mode for files
- touch based skaling and rotating of content
- html & xml viewer
